trans-unit.source: Specifies how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> will gain additional rows or columns after its existing cells are full.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 在其现有单元格已满之后，如何获取其他行或列。

trans-unit.source: If all the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are filled and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is set to FixedSize, an attempt to add another control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的所有单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>填充和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>属性设置为固定大小，则尝试将添加另一个控件将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize> to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize>设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>控件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> gains additional columns after it is full.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 在已满之后将获取其他列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> gains additional rows after it is full.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 在已满之后将获取其他行。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> does not allow additional rows or columns after it is full.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 在已满之后不允许获取其他行或列。
